Job Details
  • Senior Design Architect

  • Architectural Consultancy

  • We're currently looking for a Senior Design Architect with Revit experience working on SUPER HIGH RISE projects (minimum 45 storey) for one of the Middle Easts most well respected Design Architect who has made an excellent name for himself throughout the Middle East

  • Our client is now looking for someone who has ideally been working in Europe or the Far East on super high-rise projects (minimum 45 storeys high) and has previously had experience in the Middle East.
    Requirements:
  • 10+ years of experience
  • Super High-rise project experience
  • Client Facing
  • Ability to manage multi-discipline consultants including: Fire Life safety, MEP, Structures, VT etc
  • Ability to maintain control of project figures including: Project Areas, Efficiencies, Project Costs, Value engineering proposalsas well as regulate staff resource spend on the project.
  • Experience if developing marketing quality renders with external rendering agencies
  • Ability to delegate a team size of approximately 5
  • Eye for detail
  • Self-Checker
  • Self-Starter
  • Maintains good outlook even under extreme pressure
  • Ability to manage multiple projects (after completion of VIDA at later stage).
  • Experience putting together packages in Revit (direct Revit user ideal SketchUp user ideal
